about_the_game:
Includes Unreleased Tracks, Outtakes, and Alternate Mixes from the FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 Soundtrack!

This collection features arrangements by the original trio of composers, along with contributions from Ryo Yamazaki, Kengo Tokusashi, and Yoshitaka Suzuki.
detailed_description:

This collection features arrangements by the original trio of composers, along with contributions from Ryo Yamazaki, Kengo Tokusashi, and Yoshitaka Suzuki.
